Name: GunWorld VR
About the game: A gun sandbox simulator shooter VR game where anything is possible. Fully physical hands - build any gun possible, design physics systems, save and protect your castle from medieval enemies using Modern Weapons, or have loads of fun practicing in the worlds first 4Km VR sniper shooting range, all in VR. Full Physical hand interactions - as realistic as real life. GunWorld VR will make you enjoy guns as realistic as possible in VR. We calibrate each gun to its exact physical dimensions, so that each shot - each recoil - feels amazingly real. You will know the difference when you try GunWorld VR for the first time. The shooting experience can only be felt by experiencing the recoil physics in exquisite detail for each gun. Join our discord community for news, updates, and social events. Key Features: 100% Physical Hand Interactions - just like real life Physics Driven recoil interaction with guns Build anything possible with limitless gun attachments Physically glue any object to any other object to build anything possible Multiple games and modes within this game - you'll get multiple games for the price of one GunWorld VR is inspired by amazing games like: Boneworks, Hot Dogs, Horseshoes & Hand Grenades, Half-Life: Alyx, Pavlov VR, Onward, Ravenfield, Squad. We believe in experimenting and combining the best features of what our community believes is great, and we always want to hear your thoughts. Join us in our discord server today!
